alert.note: Alert for Shawano (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 1:34PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A thunderstorm with torrential rain will impact portions of western Shawano County through 215 PM CDT... At 132 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Wittenberg, or 18 miles south of Antigo. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Rainfall of an inch an hour or more and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Localized flooding. Locations impacted include... Wittenberg, Bowler, Eland and Shepley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
